account-signin.MASCOT_TEXT_WEDOGOOD: On WE DO GOOD, you can invest in royalties on projects you choose and have positive economic, social, or environmental impacts.
account-signin.MASCOT_TEXT_FORGOTTEN_MAIL: If you don't remember the email address you used to log in, contact us via the online chat or the contact form so that we can guide you.
account-signin.MASCOT_TEXT_NOTICE_1: We will proceed to your registration together. It will only take you a few minutes.
account-signin.MASCOT_TEXT_NOTICE_2: To register for the purpose of investing, remember to prepare
account-signin.MASCOT_TEXT_NOTICE_2bis: 2 identity documents including at least one identity card and / or passport.
account-signin.MASCOT_TEXT_NOTICE_3: Your information will not be passed on to third parties and will remain confidential.
account-signin.NOT_REGISTERED: Enter your email address to log in or create an account.
account-signin.SIGNIN_ERROR_NOT_FOUND: You do not have an account yet, choose a password to create one.
account-signin.ERROR_PASSWORD: The password entered does not match.
account-signin.NOTICE_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and consist of upper and lower case letters and numbers.
account-signin.BAD_EMAIL_FORMAT: Your email address is not in the correct format. Can you recheck?
account-signin.BAD_PASSWORD_FORMAT: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, including at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number.
account-signin.LOST_ACCESS_TO_FACEBOOK: I no longer have access to my Facebook account
account-signin.SIGNIN_ERROR_ORGA: This email address corresponds to an organization. To log in, choose one of the accounts below.
account-signin.SIGNIN_ERROR_REQUEST: Problem connecting to the website, please try again.
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_TEXT_1: A verification email has been sent to you at
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_TEXT_2: Click the button in that email to activate your account.
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_TEXT_3: It may take a few minutes to arrive. Remember to check your unwanted emails. If you need help, contact us by clicking on the chat bubble at the bottom right of your screen.
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_MAIL_NOT_RECEIVED: I did not receive the verification email
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_EXPLICATION: As part of the redesign of our site and for communication between us to be optimal, we are verifying the email addresses of all our users.
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_CHANGE_MAIL: I want to change my email address
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_MAIL_SENT: Very good ! A new email has been sent to you.
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_MAIL_NOT_SENT: Sending problem: The verification email was not sent.
account-signin.CONFIRMATION_MAIL_NO_ACCOUNT: We could not find this user on the site.
account-signin.CHANGE_MAIL_SENT: Very good ! Your address has been changed and a new email has been sent to you.
account-signin.CHANGE_MAIL_NOT_SENT: Sending problem: The verification email was not sent.
account-signin.CHANGE_MAIL_NO_ACCOUNT: We could not find this user on the site.
account-signin.CHANGE_MAIL_NOT_OK: The new email address is not valid.
account-signin.FORGOTTEN_PASS_TEXT_1: Forgot your password ? No worries: enter your login email address below and you will receive instructions by email to reset it.
account-signin.FORGOTTEN_PASS_MAIL_SENT: A message has been sent to your email address.
account-signin.FORGOTTEN_PASS_MAIL_NOT_SENT: Sending problem: The reset email was not sent.
account-signin.FORGOTTEN_PASS_MAIL_FACEBOOK: This user is linked by their Facebook account and therefore we cannot renew their password. Please contact us by email, at invest@wedogood.co, if you wish to unlink the Facebook account.
account-signin.FORGOTTEN_PASS_MAIL_NO_ACCOUNT: We could not find this user on the site.
account-signin.UNLINK_FACEBOOK_TEXT: In order to unlink your account from Facebook, we will send you an email with a unique secure link. You will need to click on this link to prove that you still have access to this email address, and you can then create your password.

launch-project.TITLE: Fundraising launch
launch-project.TEXT_1: Congratulations, your brief has been validated by WE DO GOOD!
launch-project.TEXT_3: Please note, the fundraising must be set up by the company's legal representative from their personal account, who can then invite the rest of the team.
launch-project.ALREADY_EXISTING_PROJECTS: You have already created one (or more) project(s) on the platform:
launch-project.CREATE_NEW_PROJECT_INDEED: If you still want to create a new project, please fill out the form below.
launch-project.ORGA_MAIL_DIFFERENT: This address must be different from that of your personal account, for instance contact@your-business.com
launch-project.VALIDATE_CONDITIONS: I accept the special terms and conditions
launch-project.EMPTY_OR_WRONG_FORMAT_FIELD: One of the fields is empty or is not in the correct format

intro.TITLE: Is my project eligible?
intro.TEXT_2: Make an appointment with our team at the end of the test to discuss it!
intro.TEXT_4: You can save, exit and come back at any time!

the-project-link-send.TITLE: Resume a previous test
the-project-link-send.TEXT: Please enter the email previously used to start your test. If one or more tests are in progress, you will receive the access links by email.
the-project-link-send.ERROR_EMAIL_NO_PROJECT: No test has been performed using this address.
the-project-link-send.ERROR_EMAIL_INCORRECT: The email address is not valid.
the-project-link-send.ERROR_EMAIL_EMPTY: The email address must be provided.

project-infos.TITLE: My project
project-infos.SUBTITLE: All fields are mandatory
project-infos.FORM_TEXT_SOURCE_PROSPECT: I heard about WE DO GOOD through
project-infos.FORM_TEXT_USER_EMAIL: you can reach me at the email address

location-types.EURO: in the euro zone, United Kingdom or Swiss

source-types.SOMEONE: someone who told me about it

mascot-text.INIT: Your information is not passed on to third parties and remains confidential.
mascot-text.NEED_EMAIL: Once your email address has been provided, you can resume your test at any time.
mascot-text.NOT_CREATED: WE DO GOOD can assist you once the company is registered.
mascot-text.MICROBUSINESS: WE DO GOOD can only support activities carried out by legal persons.
mascot-text.OUT_EURO: WE DO GOOD can only support organisations registered in the euro zone.
mascot-text.LESS_10K: WE DO GOOD can only assist you for amounts exceeding €10,000.

project-funding.TITLE: My financing
project-funding.TOGGLE_LABEL: I understand the forecast of royalty payments

the-project-goal-amount.TITLE: I want to raise €
the-project-goal-amount.TOOLTIP: This amount is the maximum you want to raise in exchange for royalties.

commercial-margin.TITLE: My commercial margin
commercial-margin.TOOLTIP: Your gross margin or margin on variable costs. The royalty rate should not exceed 10% of your margin.

royalties-amount.TITLE: Royalties that I would give up
royalties-amount.OF_MY_QUARTERLY_TURNOVER: of my quarterly turnover for 5 years*
royalties-amount.ROYALTIES_PERCENT_DEFAULT: You can customise this rate. WE DO GOOD advises you to set a rate between {adviceMinPercent}% and {adviceMaxPercent}%.
royalties-amount.ROYALTIES_PERCENT_WARNING_OVER: The percentage is too high compared with your margin; the royalties would risk weakening your economic model. WE DO GOOD advises you to set a rate between {adviceMinPercent}% and {adviceMaxPercent}%.
royalties-amount.ROYALTIES_PERCENT_WARNING_UNDER: The percentage is too low. You must have already validated your economic model (turnover of more than €100,000) to validate this percentage.  WE DO GOOD advises you to set a rate between {adviceMinPercent}% and {adviceMaxPercent}%.
royalties-amount.ROYALTIES_PERCENT_CUSTOM: The percentage entered is correct. WE DO GOOD advises you to set a rate between {adviceMinPercent}% and {adviceMaxPercent}%.
royalties-amount.ROYALTIES_NOT_OK: Royalties do not seem suited to your business model.

royalties-warning.WARNING_1: The recommended percentage is calculated so that your investors double their investment in 5 years, according to your forecast.
royalties-warning.WARNING_2: The minimum that you can set is {warningMinPercent}%.

turnover-scenario.LESS_THAN_PLANNED: is not going as well as expected

scenario-description.AS_PLANNED: The royalties follow the progression of your turnover.
scenario-description.LESS_THAN_PLANNED: If your turnover is less than expected, you will pay fewer royalties (or zero if there is no turnover at all). Payments continue until the investors are reimbursed.
scenario-description.MORE_THAN_PLANNED: If your turnover is more than expected, you pay more royalties, knowing that the maximum gain for your investors is capped at three times the investment made and that the royalties payment contracts have a fixed term (5 years).
scenario-description.STOP_THE_ROYALTIES: You have the option to terminate your contract early if necessary.
scenario-description.ACTIVITY_STOP: If unfortunately your business goes bankrupt, your investors will lose their investment, but they will have recovered royalties until that point. You do not have to provide any collateral.

advice.TITLE: WE DO GOOD tips
advice.SUBTITLE: To make your project eligible, you can:
advice.ADVICE1_TITLE: Reduce the amount to be raised in royalties.
advice.ADVICE1_TEXT: Bear in mind that royalties can be used on part of the funding requirement to unblock a bank loan or grants.
advice.ADVICE3_TITLE: Use the percentage recommended by WE DO GOOD below.
advice.NO_SOLUTION1: If none of these solutions are possible, your business model may not be suited to royalties.
advice.NO_SOLUTION2: You can visit www.trouverlebonfinancement.fr to discover other types of crowdfunding.

project-investors.TITLE: My investors
project-investors.READY_TO_COMMUNICATE: I am ready to communicate with those around me
project-investors.WHICH_CIRCLES_TO_COMMUNICATE: Which circles are you ready to communicate with?
project-investors.ALREADY_DONE_CROWDFUNDING: I have already run a crowdfunding campaign
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_1A: Starting and succeeding in fundraising takes time and a personal commitment by you and your team.
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_1B: You must be ready to communicate with those around you to tip the odds in your favour.
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_2: Unfortunately, without mobilising your friends and family and network, it will be difficult for you to convince and gain the confidence of other investors.
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_LOVEMONEY: Royalties are a good option for a small number of people from your personal circle (love money) or professional network to invest. Simple, quick and confidential.
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_PRIVATE: As many people as you want can invest by reserving this possibility for the people you have identified. Quick and confidential.
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_PUBLIC: You can benefit from good visibility through Crowdfunding, but to reach the general public, you must start with your friends and family!
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_ALREADY_DONE: Great, I see we are dealing with someone experienced!
project-investors.MASCOT_TEXT_NEED_ADVICE: WE DO GOOD can assist you with your communications

project-result.TITLE: Your project is eligible!
project-result.TARGET_PUBLIC: with your loved ones, your contacts and the general public
project-result.YOU_WILL_PAY: and you will pay them every quarter

private.TITLE: Private fundraising
private.TEXT: Have your network invest by using the platform privately
private.AMOUNT_1: 4% Success Commission on the amount raised (2% for 5 or fewer investors)
private.AMOUNT_2: 5% on the royalties paid (min. €60 per declaration)

crowdfunding.TITLE: Public fundraising
crowdfunding.TEXT: Mobilise your networks and promote your project to new investors
crowdfunding.AMOUNT_1: 8% success fee on the amount raised (6% with comprehensive assistance, 4% on amounts raised over €100,000)
crowdfunding.AMOUNT_2: 3% on the royalties paid (min. €60 per declaration)

options.PAGE_VISIBLE_ON_WDG: Publicly visible page on WE DO GOOD
options.COMMUNICATION_ON_NETWORKS: Dissemination of your fundraising on our social media and newsletter
options.REFERENCED_TO_PARTNERS: Referencing of your fundraising on the websites of our partners (BPI Tous Nos Projets, Novafi, Info Durable)
options.MANAGED_THROUGH_PLATFORM: Centralised management of investors and royalty payments
options.SUPPORT: Technical, legal and tax support for you and your investors
options.PAYMENTS: Collection of investments online and by cheque
options.EVALUATION: Evaluation period to validate the interest of potential investors and bring together pre-investments
options.GREEN_LABEL: Crowdfunding for Green Growth label (on request and subject to project evaluation)

basic.TITLE: Basic Support
basic.TEXT: For entrepreneurs who have already identified their investors or who have already conducted a fundraising campaign

standard.TITLE: Essential Support
standard.TEXT: For entrepreneurs wishing to follow a well-informed path to conduct their fundraising with confidence

complete.TITLE: Comprehensive Support
complete.TEXT: For entrepreneurs who want responses, opinions and advice to move faster and more efficiently

list.READ_PITCH_AND_COM: Proofreading your presentation and your communication media
list.COMMISSION_REDUCTION: Commission at 6% instead of 8% on the PUBLIC FUNDRAISING formula
list.WORKSHOP: Two-hour preparation workshop to lay the foundations with your team (communication tips and crowdfunding methodology advice, definition of the action plan, handling of the platform)

not-eligible.PROJECT_DOESNT_SEEM_ELIGIBLE: Your project does not appear to be eligible...
not-eligible.MICROBUSINESS: You work as a sole proprietorship or micro-enterprise.
not-eligible.OUT_EURO: Your company is or will not be registered in the euro zone, in the United Kingdom or in Swiss.
not-eligible.NOT_ADAPTED: The royalties model might not be adapted to your business model. Your gross margin might not be exact.
not-eligible.NEED_LOVEMONEY: Crowdfunding requires the mobilisation of those around you to get off to a good start (relatives or industrial and commercial partners).
not-eligible.SPECIFIC_PROJECT: Your project is specific and could still benefit from royalties (longer duration, financing of equipment with margin...)
not-eligible.SEND_EMAIL: Send us an email at projects@wedogood.co

prospect-meetup.ADD_FILES_TEXT: To prepare for our meeting, you need to have these documents ready:
prospect-meetup.FILE_PREVISIONNEL: ► A financial forecast including a financing plan and a forecast income statement
prospect-meetup.SEND_FILES_INPUT_LABEL: Can you tell us a little more about your project and any possible questions?
prospect-meetup.PLAN_RENDEZVOUS_TEXT: Let's talk about it! To get your project started and get the best advice, make an appointment!

admin.ENABLE_WIRE: Allow bank transfers without a minimum

organization-info.ADDRESS_LABEL: My head office is located at:
organization-info.EMAIL_LABEL: My company's email address (different from my personal address) is:
organization-info.AGREE_TERMS: I acknowledge that I have read and accepted the description of the benefits and the terms of publication of WE DO GOOD's project:
organization-info.6_MONTHS_TERMS: ► If the project is not put online within 6 months of the validation date of this form, WE DO GOOD may re-charge the application fee.
organization-info.PAYMENT_TERMS: ► Settlement terms: fixed fees and options to be paid on subscription; success fees levied on the payment of funds to the project-related account. Fees on investor payments invoiced at the time of these payments (not included in royalties).

wire.BACK: Return to the choice of payment method
wire.TITLE: Transfer to WE DO GOOD
wire.VALIDATE: Validate the receipt of the transfer

complete.THANK_YOU: Thank you for placing your trust in us.
complete.CREATE: You can now create your project on WE DO GOOD!

intro.MASCOT_TEXT_1: Avant d'investir, nous devons vérifier que vous comprenez le risque de perte de votre investissement.
intro.MASCOT_TEXT_2: Nous allons donc compléter ensemble votre profil investisseur.
intro.MASCOT_TEXT_3: En accord avec la réglementation européenne, le questionnaire suivant nous permettra de qualifier votre profil.

capacity.FINANCIAL_AVAILABILITY_DESCRIPTION: Vous pouvez indiquer des montants estimés, que vous pourrez modifier ensuite sur votre compte. Cela ne vous empêchera pas d'investir.
capacity.MASCOT: L'investissement en direct dans des entreprises est un pari risqué. Pour vous aider à y voir plus clair et conformément à la réglementation européenne, nous allons calculer votre capacité à encaisser des pertes, établie par défaut à 10 % de vos capacités financières
capacity.NET_REVENUES: Mes revenus nets s'élèvent à environ
capacity.COMPLEMENTARY_REVENUES: Je dispose aussi de revenus complémentaires d'environ
capacity.INVESTMENTS: Mon épargne et placements financiers s'élèvent à environ
capacity.RECURRING_COMMITMENT: Mes engagements récurrents financiers actuels (loyers, remboursement de prêt...) s'élèvent à
capacity.MAX_INVESTMENT: Nous vous recommandons de ne pas investir plus de :
capacity.MAX_INVESTMENT_DESCRIPTION: Cette recommandation est calculée conformément à la réglementation européenne de la manière suivante :

knowledge.SELECT: Sélectionnez dans les propositions suivantes celle(s) qui vous concernent :
knowledge.NO_WORRIES: Pas d'inquiétude, vous pourrez quand même investir.
knowledge.RISKS: J'ai compris les risques liés à l'investissement contre royalties, notamment les risques de perte totale ou partielle des montants investis, et de décalage dans le temps du versement de mes royalties.
knowledge.CROWDFUNDING: J'ai déjà investi en financement participatif dans des activités en phase de démarrage ou de développement contre une rétribution financière (prêt, obligations, investissement contre royalties, investissement en capital...) au cours des 10 dernières années.
knowledge.TRANSACTIONS: J'ai effectué au moins 10 transactions par trimestre sur les marchés financiers depuis plus d'un an.

profession.INTRO: Dans le cadre de réglementation, ces informations sont nécessaires pour définir votre profil investisseur.
profession.FINANCE_JOB: Je travaille ou j'ai travaillé dans le secteur financier ou en tant que cadre supérieur dans une entreprise réalisant plus de 2M€ de chiffre d'affaires annuel, ayant un total de bilan de plus de 1M€ ou des capitaux propres de plus de 100 K€.
profession.CROWDFUNDING: J'ai eu les formations et expériences suivantes dans le domaine du financement participatif :

objectives.TITLE: Mes objectifs d'investissement
objectives.DURATIONS: Je souhaite investir sur des durées prévisionnelles de :
objectives.IMPACTS: Je souhaite investir sur des projets à impact positif :

purpose-types.PROJECT_OWNER: Soutenir un (ou des) porteur(s) de projet que je connais
purpose-types.SECTORS: Investir dans des secteurs qui m'intéressent
purpose-types.IMPACTS: Soutenir des projets à impacts positifs

objectives.NEWLETTER: Je souhaite recevoir des informations sur les projets correspondant à mes objectifs d'investissement (une fois par mois)

result.CAN_INVEST: Vous pouvez investir le montant de votre choix.
result.CAPACITY_AMOUNT: Toutefois, sachez que votre capacité à encaisser des pertes est estimée à {capacityAmount} € / an.
result.ADVICE_NOT_MORE: Nous vous conseillons de ne pas investir plus que ce montant.
result.CAN_EDIT: Si votre situation change, vous pouvez modifier vos réponses à tout moment dans votre compte personnel.
result.NEXT_YEAR: Sinon, ces questions vous seront à nouveau posées l'année prochaine.
result.LAWS: Calculé selon le REGLEMENT (UE) 2020/1503 DU PARLEMENT EUROPEEN ET DU CONSEIL
